name: Childcare
description: Childcare programs to foster early literacy, math skills, and holistic wellness, instilling healthy habits.
fullDescription: Childcare programs to foster early literacy, math skills, and holistic wellness, instilling healthy habits.
whatTheyOffer: Childcare programs to foster early literacy, math skills, and holistic wellness, instilling healthy habits.
howToGetIt: The SF Early Learning Alliance handles applications and enrollment. To learn more about eligibility and to schedule a tour please complete and submit the form on this page. Or contact Odette Cifuentes via email: ocifuentes@sfela.org or call ph: 628-268-4179.
cost: This is a fee based service
agency: Friends of St. Francis Child Care Center
